divs: Sighting Detailsme and my friend was at a bus stop and we seen flash's and at first we fort it was just lighting and when my friend went home i started to walk back home and i seen a kinda purple ball shape it was really bright and i fort it was just a star and then after it hovering for about 20seconds it just faded away. When i got home i was panicing thinking what it was and then i started to see flashes thought my window and i took a video and about after 15min the purple light came back and i took a picture of it , the ball was all in 1 and then split into 2 balls and 1 faded away and the other ball shot up into the sky
trends: There have been 57 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around August 6th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
